attributes.action: Oppose planning to build more industrial units at Barleycastle Lane
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to demonstrate to Warrington Planning department the local opinion on Mr Morley's recent planning application at Barleycastle Lane.
Those who sign this petition are saying that they would be UNHAPPY if government approved the building of a new storage and distribution unit at Barleycastle lane due to the bad impact on environment and congestion this would cause in Appleton Thorn, as well as the noise, pollution and general disturbances this would create.
